Articles.Content:
OK, so a while ago I made an Enterprise and as I was contemplating my next task it occurred to me that it would be pretty awesome if I made the Reliant, put rail guns on both ships and re-create the last scene in the Wrath of Kahn.

Both are capable of achieving orbit on their own, I do have MechJebs attached and it works for the Reliant but has no idea what to do with the Enterprise so I have to fly it manually.

Now I just have to practice my rendezvous orbits.

yeah, both are pretty stable. I\'ve flown them both a bunch. I\'ve given the Enterprise the most attention and have taken her to the moon and back. I haven\'t made a booster system for the Reliant yet so she consumes most of her fuel on the way up. Getting them close enough to each other to fire their salvos is tricky enough but will be well worth it.
Now you just need someone to make a nebula part.
